scripts.git-init: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/VacantThinker/learn_javascript.git
scripts.push-master: git checkout master && git push origin master --force
scripts.push-main: git checkout main && git push origin main --force
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && npm run add-and-commit
scripts.second-push: npm run add-and-commit && npm run push-main
